function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal space and outdoor spaces in current housing stock","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread due to close proximity and crowding","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and providing outdoor communal spaces","Technologies":"Smart building management systems for monitoring occupancy and contact tracing","People":"Occupants of crowded or poorly designed housing","Owner":"Public authorities, private developers"},{"Description":"Increased remote working leading to prolonged indoor exposure","Impact":"Potential decline in mental and physical health, increased risk of sedentary lifestyle-related diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting regular exercise and outdoor activities, encouraging breaks and movement during remote work","Technologies":"Health and wellness tracking apps, remote fitness and wellness programs","People":"Remote workers and their families","Owner":"Employers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Monetization of housing leading to overcrowding and substandard living conditions","Impact":"Higher density living contributing to higher risk of disease transmission and inadequate living conditions","Mitigation":"Enforcing building codes and regulations, promoting affordable and safe housing options","Technologies":"Smart building design software, modular construction techniques","People":"Potential tenants and occupants of overcrowded housing","Owner":"Public authorities, private landlords"}]}
